column5: "Hom mfa enyigye nsom EWURADZE: Hom mfa adwontow mbra n’enyim."

column2: "Hom nhu dɛ EWURADZE nye Nyankopɔn: Ɔno na ɔayɛ hɛn
column4: na yɛnndze hɛn ho bi; Yɛyɛ ne man

column3: Na hom mfa ayɛyi mbra n’abanguado: Hom mfa ndaase mma no
na no mbɔbɔrhu wɔ hɔ daa; Na no nokwardzi kodu mbasantsen nyinara do."
